channel.title: Star wars saturday/sunday - special edition
channel.description:
**To celebrate 3 years of Rich Rogers' wonderful dedication to Star Wars Saturdays, the Gauntlet is hosting 2 days of Star Wars themed gaming!**
Events will take place across the weekend of **5th & 6th December 2020.** Games will be played in a variety of systems, hosted by GMs from all across the globe.
This thread will act as a masterlist for the events and will be updated periodically as GMs post their games to the Gauntlet Calendar. This is to avoid spamming the Forum with multiple posts and to act as a single point of reference for all games.
I will edit this post with updates throughout the day. All times will be posted in GMT for consistency and personal ease, but the site should show you in the local time.
**Saturday 5th**
* **Bounty of the Week: The Grand Diva of Chandrila** - Saturday, 5th Dec 9:00 GMT https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MIic-bYES5zlwOdsNBz * **Escape From Rancor Island 1/2** - 0930GMT https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MIiRCcXXxks8QM_6NlZ * **Coruscant Droid Cantina** - 1100 GMT https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MInUvNA4fZ1aSH7jqks * **Apocalypse World: Jakku 1/2** - 1500 GMT https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MIjTmfEF1_ODmXfYW_X * **Tree Punk Swoop Gang!** - 1500 GMT https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MIkPMaV-wzUh-85u2e7 * **Thirsty Lightsaber Lesbians 1/2** 1700 GMT https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MIl0K--wnsGZtm1UGa4 * **Droids** - 2000 GMT https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MIoLJ-hmspMPWsLs1Pr * **Star Wars World: Utinni!** 2100 GMT https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MIj-sxjc0sZ1ZtcHlTd * **Heist on Hoth!** - 2100 GMT https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MIip7kz2o-cTASJ_Qt2
**Sunday 6th** * **The Final Jedi** - 0100 GMT https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MIkisGOE21voZ9nXW7K * **Galactic Martial Arts Championships Masters 1/2 - 0100 GMT https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MIoNpZxYxbRyQevbKve * **Escape From Rancor Island 2/2** - 09:30GMT https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MIiRNK0fQUdapmQ5YLR * **One Last Job: Canto Bight** - 1100 GMT https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MInYVTEuXRnZW9G7ZVO * **Against the Sith Conspiracy** - 1400 GMT https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MIiq4X1t2epSWpAC8TK * **Apocalypse World: Jakku 2/2** - 1500 GMT https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MIjU6B78CXINjJ-EMQn * **Thirsty Lightsaber Lesbians 2/2** 1700 GMT https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MIl11-bLD3bGx_u9skn * **Hutt Cartel** - 19:00GMT https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MIian8nCsBjvMz8IsKr * **Droids** - 2000 GMT https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MIoLarpG6KXFfci-xut * **Galactic Martial Arts Championships Masters 2/2** - 2500 https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MIoNpZxYxbRyQevbKve (this one is at 0100 GMT on the 7th... Timezones everyone!)

item.title: Star wars saturday/sunday - special edition
item.dc:creator: @Will_H
item.description:
@Will_H wrote:

To celebrate 3 years of Rich Rogers’ wonderful dedication to Star Wars Saturdays, the Gauntlet is hosting 2 days of Star Wars themed gaming!

Events will take place across the weekend of 5th & 6th December 2020. Games will be played in a variety of systems, hosted by GMs from all across the globe.

This thread will act as a masterlist for the events and will be updated periodically as GMs post their games to the Gauntlet Calendar. This is to avoid spamming the Forum with multiple posts and to act as a single point of reference for all games.

I will edit this post with updates throughout the day. All times will be posted in GMT for consistency and personal ease, but the site should show you in the local time.

Saturday 5th

  • Bounty of the Week: The Grand Diva of Chandrila - Saturday, 5th Dec 9:00 GMT https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MIic-bYES5zlwOdsNBz
  • Escape From Rancor Island 1/2 - 0930GMT https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MIiRCcXXxks8QM_6NlZ

  • Apocalypse World: Jakku 1/2 - 1500 GMT https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MIjTmfEF1_ODmXfYW_X
  • Tree Punk Swoop Gang! - 1500 GMT https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MIkPMaV-wzUh-85u2e7
  • Thirsty Lightsaber Lesbians 1/2 1700 GMT https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MIl0K--wnsGZtm1UGa4
  • Droids - 2000 GMT https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MIoLJ-hmspMPWsLs1Pr

  • Heist on Hoth! - 2100 GMT https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MIip7kz2o-cTASJ_Qt2

Sunday 6th

  • The Final Jedi - 0100 GMT https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MIkisGOE21voZ9nXW7K
  • **Galactic Martial Arts Championships Masters 1/2 - 0100 GMT https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MIoNpZxYxbRyQevbKve
  • Escape From Rancor Island 2/2 - 09:30GMT https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MIiRNK0fQUdapmQ5YLR
  • One Last Job: Canto Bight - 1100 GMT https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MInYVTEuXRnZW9G7ZVO
  • Against the Sith Conspiracy - 1400 GMT https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MIiq4X1t2epSWpAC8TK
  • Apocalypse World: Jakku 2/2 - 1500 GMT https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MIjU6B78CXINjJ-EMQn
  • Thirsty Lightsaber Lesbians 2/2 1700 GMT https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MIl11-bLD3bGx_u9skn
  • Hutt Cartel - 19:00GMT https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MIian8nCsBjvMz8IsKr
  • Droids - 2000 GMT https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MIoLarpG6KXFfci-xut
  • Galactic Martial Arts Championships Masters 2/2 - 2500 https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MIoNpZxYxbRyQevbKve (this one is at 0100 GMT on the 7th… Timezones everyone!)
